Me parece un buen juego, la verdad lo recomendo al 100%. Tanto jugar como superviviente o como asesino hace sentir un grado de tensión muy bueno, ademas la variedad de perks tambien ayudan a que, si bien el juego tiene basicamente un objetivo dependiendo del rol en que se juegue, el juego se haga muy variado y con distintas opciones para jugar. Eso si hay que tener en cuenta que la comunidad puede ser un poco toxica a veces, tanto jugando como en el chat, ademas de que en ocasiones se presentan ciertos bugs, pero son tolerables estos "contra" para todo lo que ofrece el juego. Por otro lado, lo actualizan constantemente asi que eso tambien es muy bueno. Ciertamente, aunque contiene ciertas cosas negativas (como todo juego), considero que es un muy buen juego, asi que lo recomiendo totalmente.

In my 100% honest opinion (but yorbi this is the internet youre not allowed ot have opinions) you're*, as i was saying in my opinion this game was good a while back. It is a heavily communtiy based game, if you have a nice killer you will have a good game. On the other hand if you have a killer who has has a shitty day and they feel like being a dick your game wont go so well. There are lots of bugs in the game (for one you can get stuck in pallets). There are also exploits you can get banned for (yknow instead of devs fixing their game they ban ya) such as landing on top of the generator in Ironworks. This game is quite one sided you will always hear peop-le say "oh killer is so broken the devs favor killer" and the opposite goes too. So in conclusion this game used to be good, used to have a good community, but now it is very toxic and i dont find it as fun as i used to on either killer or survivor. But hey what do i know im just some random guy on the internet. Im not telling you not to buy the game because everyones experience will be different, so you shouldnt base whether you should get the game or not on a Review. 

Sincerely Yorbi ~<3

You're probably scrolling past a bunch of long reviews, so I'll TLDR them here.

Devs suck ass, they just found a cash cow and are desperately milking it dry.
Devs don't listen to players when they demand things that are standard in modern games, such as colorblind mode, or specific bug and balancing fixes

Occasionally stuttery, even on my very high end rig 
Framerate locked to 60 with barely and graphics options to change
Killer FOV locked so low it almost makes you nauseous (That's intentional to make it harder for the killer to see survivors, just a warning for anyone sensitive to that)

The UI kinda sucks and battle passes are so poorly designed I can never be bothered to change them.

Model work for some DLC's suck.

BUT

The game is fun, scary depending on your tolerance obviously

Progression system is pretty good but not so easy to understand

It's best enjoyed with friends, either as a group of survivors, screen sharing your killer experience, or a full custom game with 5 people so you can kill your friends.

Conclusion: Too pricy, get it on sale it's not nearly worth that much and you're gonna need to save the money for when you wanna play as your favorite horror movie characters (They are all purchasable DLC, and there's no season pass so all the DLC racks up to hundreds of dollars.)

I sincerely hope the devs make this game F2P soon, otherwise it will continue to fizzle, only getting more players when new updates come out. 
They might as well go all-in on the micro-transaction mess they've made and make the default characters unlockable in the F2P version.

Just look at Nancy Wheeler's face. It's the scariest thing in this game.

Been playing since around June 20th 2016. And while the game has always been up and downs such as pallet vacuums, windows not being able to be blocked, gens not being able to be kicked and much more. There was still hope for the game back then. It was early access and had some small DLC's you could buy to get cosmetics. Now the game is riddled with cosmetics and characters you need to pay for. And even the ''free'' characters take upwards of 250 hours to get. Around the release of the clown (June 18th 2018) the game noticeably started to become more trash. The devs added more and more cosmetics and most of them were paid only. Just to name some of the more recent stupid things the devs have done is. Say during a Q and A that a game health update is not needed and that they don't plan for one despite most of the community agreeing that the game needs one. They helped make NFT's shortly after the release of the hellraiser chapter and only made talk of it after the chapter had been out for a bit so they could rack in more money. They have removed items from the accounts of those who criticise the dev team on the idiotic choices they make constantly. The game also becomes more and more buggy for each patch. And rather than even considering releasing the game on a new engine they simply let it be and hoard more money. There has been enough incompetence by the devs in the past years that you can easily write a book on it or make a six-hour-long video on it. It's sad to see what once was a game with so much hope and so much opportunity for the future become what it currently is. In all my years of gaming, I have never seen a dev team become as ignorant and incompetent as this. When you think they have done the most stupid thing they do something worse. It pains me to say it but I do wish this game would just start dropping players and die off. The actions of the devs are unforgivable and I hope that the rest of the dead by daylight community will start to understand that.

D'autre évaluationsexpliquerons mieux que moi les problèmes techniques. Tueurs cheater, partis qui lag parfois, car héberger par le tueur. 
Je ne sais pas comment marche les ranks mais les débutants croisent trop souvent de PGM .  
Le plaisir c'est fait très très rare en jouant à ce jeux, j'ai tenu une 20ene d'heurs car je jouais avec mes frangins sinon je voulais déjà le revendre au bout de 40 minute ( je regrette de ne pas l'avoir fait )  je les désinstallé 1 fois déjà pour y revenir, pour à nouveau le désinstaller avec le même constat. 

Jouer un tueur : alors oui si on a pas d'amis, ou qu'ils sont hors ligne on peu lancer une partis en tueur, on pourra quelques fois attendre longtemps avant que une partis ce lance 10 ou 20 minute. ça démarrera plus vite au heurs de pointe. 

Edit :Négatif au premier teste, mais les temps de lancement de partis on bien changer j'y suis revenu, faux jouer tueur survivant j'ai toujours pas compris le délire :D

第一次评论游戏给黎明杀机吧，作为我第二个入正版的游戏，之前没被禁的时候看实况真的很有意思，于是就萌生了买这个的想法，不过家里电脑配置一直都不够，最近有时间在网吧玩，所以入了这坑，奈何没人陪我开黑，只能玩屠夫一个人孤单的守着农场去把那些想要偷电的小贼全送去温养恶灵，其实说实话这游戏对新手也没那么不友好，玩了两个小时，人和屠夫一半一半的局数，屠夫是4胜（全是祭品杀）1负，而幸存者刚好相反，1胜4负，虽然玩幸存者输得很多但我其实并觉得屠夫很不友好，完全是队友不知道是萌新还是太喜欢当柜皇了，一开始就我一个人去修发电机，另外三个其中两个还拿着工具箱就开始蹲柜子，我被爆菊花了也不来救我，最后被屠夫一个一个从柜子里面揪出来诠释恶意送人头的典范。
而屠夫就比较有意思了，我比较喜欢的是陷阱屠夫，靠近那个正在修发电机的幸存者，两刀子下去他就爹妈不认的滚到一边去乖乖当祭品了，而我花费我宝贵时间安装的捕兽夹也并没有辜负我的期望，顺利抓到想要来救人的偷电贼，可喜可贺。
最后一句话总结，屠夫欢乐多，偷电毁一生（滑稽）。
很有趣

Игра, которая была мной недооценена. Всегда считала, что тамошнее "камунити" просто ужасно. Но, ничего, что могло бы напрячь старого бойца. Игрушка затягивает, хотя и разнообразием вроде как не блещет.  В плане геймплея та же Пятница более разнообразна, но понравилась несколько меньше. Правда, первые часы упорно хочется найти винтовку и раздать мане по первое число. Увы, тут нет даже возможности дать отпор, только стелс и игра в гляделки, с периодической беготней, что любителя шутеров ранит в самое сердце. Одним словом, непривычно для меня, но весьма неплохо. Игра из категории:"Еще катку и спать".
P.S. Да, я погорячилась и правда насчет камунити, слишком оно специфичное. Из акков, которым самоутвердиться больше негде. Не днище, но дно, что есть то есть...

Данная игра с довольно мрачной обстановкой, хоррор элементами и проверкой вашей реакции. Но на долгое время игры не хватает, если вы играете с друзьями то время игры растянется и игра станет интересней, но опять же не на долго. Что я могу сказать о геймплее игры, он довольно однообразен, если вы играете за выживших, всё что вы делаете это ломаете крюки, чините генераторы, пытаетесь сбежать от маньяка и всё; если вы играете за маньяка, вы просто должны убить выживших и не дать им сбежать (геймплей за маньяка меняется при приобретении DLC, но суть всё таже: убей, не дай сбежать).Но если в вашей кампании есть безбашенный и весёлый друг, то я советую играть с ним и тогда игра надоест не так быстро.

廷刺激的游戲

It is way too grindy for you to enjoy actual content. Once you played enough of this game and enjoy the theme , you will want to play the games to use different perks. However, to do so, you will be forced to play the game for hundred of hours. I guess this isn't much of a problem for a survivor as game is much more tolerable towards survivor, but unless you are hardcore dead by daylight dedicated player, you need to play minimum of 500+ hours to start enjoy playing the killer.

Furthermore, honestly BHVR doesn't have a clue on how to balance the game so your experience in the game will be very tough. Especially as low rank killer, game will feel very easy, but as you climb up towards the red rank, it will be extremely hard because you will face tons of swf and survivors who know how to play the game. 

If you are playing this game so you can use different perks, addons, items, be prepare to pour hundreds of hours into the game. Unless you have tons of free time (like myself), stay away. Lastly, BHVR is horribly at managing their game with tremendous amount of bugs, server issue, and so on. They will tell you that they are "working" on it, but note that they aren't, and problems won't be fixed.

拜托准备玩这款游戏的萌新看以下守则：
1，上钩分为二个阶段，刚上钩不要挣扎，给队友争取点时间
2，救队友没救成倒在队友脚下赶快爬走，一个在钩上一个在脚下，这不是方便屠夫守尸嘛
3，屠夫守得很死，救不了，二阶段时敲空格为队友争取修电机的时间。也给那些爱守尸的垃圾屠夫一个教训
4，这个游戏对萌新极不友好，玩屠夫被溜，玩人最早死，如果你有顆玻璃心就不要买了
